name: Cod With A Bazooka
description:
Thanks so much for all of the comments and feedback. I think I'm going to continue this project since you all seem to think its fun. I'm going to change the cod's aiming mechanics, add more levels, a story, and flesh it out. Again, thanks for all of the support for this game. This is only my second game jam and pretty much the only game I've made public that I'm proud of.

You're a Cod with a Bazooka.

Its just a random idea that I had a day or 2 before the jam. And it was perfect.

You are a cod who was a laboratory experiment, but the facility has received critical damage and no-one expects any surv... Wait, where did you get that Bazooka?

Blast your way through doors, piranhas, and turrets to escape the facility.

I hope to add more to the game and make it a full Steam release, but for the jam I think this is a great start. 

KNOWN ISSUES / BUGS

  • I forgot to wipe playerprefs before the final export and I didn't catch it. You can manually fix this by resetting the data from the "More" Menu. I can't upload a fix due to the fact that the submission period is over

Engine: Unity

Art: Google Draw

Audio: LMMS, YT Audio Library

All assets and code are made by me except for a few sounds, with the help of a few Brackeys tutorials

Controls: WSAD, Left Click
